description:

Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

Director: Scott Waugh
Writers: George Gatins (screenplay), George Gatins (story)
Stars: Aaron Paul, Dominic Cooper, Scott Mescudi 
Genres: Action | Crime | Drama | Thriller
Country: USA
Language: English


Need.For.Speed.2014.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources: 

Video:Original Chinese HDCAM + Naked Man Scene from Spanish Cam
Audio: Line (Echo)
thx

Notes:

for sources so far we have seen:
a) smy release with chinese subs all over 
b)  diy release with better video but watermarks all over
c) that "so called 1080p cam" which looks washed out and is stuttering like hell on all action scenes,
which makes that movie experience unenjoyable since 80% are action scenes in this movie
dont know what happened with that one, but if i had to guess it got upscaled from that rmvb file that had only 15frames.

finally I got the real source file which is perfect, no framerate issues, no watermarks,no jerky video, no additional foreign subs
all very nice - a bit dark perhaps on night scenes but i think i got that covered,
some occasional screen translation subs were still in the video hardcoded, left them in it no need for blurring or cropping them

Encode:

added brightness,sharpness,contrast,saturation and fixed rgb without going over

noticed like in all chinese cams the nudity scene got cut out, what a bummer, that belongs into the video
so i got the spanish cam which was ok-ish but had the nudity scene in it, 
i cut out that 20sec scene and placed it into my video and used the audio from Mr. Bootlegger for it (thx btw)

Audio is from Echo out of the Millenium release, which was very nice
did the usual with it, ran it through cleaning and synced it back to my video

all in all its perfect now and will do me till retail
already watched my version, i really enjoyed the movie its great fun like this


Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1700 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 Stereo Line
Sample: yes included
